title: Chris Coyier: A Modern Web Designer's Workflow
description: More and more is expected from today's web designers. Visual design is just one small part of the job. Those designs also need interaction. They need to work across loads of devices of varying shapes and sizes. They need to be fast and easy to use. As a designer, you need to be able to communicate and share code across a team. You need to be familiar with lots of differnet technologies.
